(5371x1+0)/1 mod 8192 = 5371. (5371x3+1)/2 mod 4096 = 3961. (5371x9+5)/4 mod 2048 = 1846. (5371x9+5)/8 mod 1024 = 923. (5371x27+23)/16 mod 512 = 361. (5371x81+85)/32 mod 256 = 30. (5371x81+85)/64 mod 128 = 15. (5371x243+319)/128 mod 64 = 23. (5371x729+1085)/256 mod 32 = 3. (5371x2187+3511)/512 mod 16 = 5. (5371x6561+11045)/1024 mod 8 = 0. (5371x6561+11045)/2048 mod 4 = 0. (5371x6561+11045)/4096 mod 2 = 0. (5371x6561+11045)/8192 mod 1 = 0.
